title: Characterizing the Demographics Behind the #BlackLivesMatter Movement

analysis.reason: The paper examines racial engagement disparities on social media related to the #BlackLivesMatter movement, addressing racial inequality and representation.
analysis.other_detail: Focus on racial demographics in social media activism
analysis.methodology_detail: Analyzing Twitter data and user demographics

title: A survey on measuring indirect discrimination in machine learning

analysis.reason: The paper addresses algorithmic fairness, bias, and discriminatory effects in data-driven applications affecting social groups.

title: Exposing the Probabilistic Causal Structure of Discrimination

analysis.reason: The paper focuses on discrimination detection related to protected groups, addressing social bias and inequality issues.
